name: Wizard Force
description:
Enter the labyrinth and seek the Cube of Biernimak.  Battle powerful foes wielding your magic and discover hidden secrets.   Tame your enemies and make them fight for you.

Featuring music by Bert Cole.

Controls:

Arrow Keys – Movement

Z – Confirm / Check.  Open chests, enter small doors, activate magic circles, etc. 

X – Enter the menu / Cancel.  In battles, you can hit X while selecting your moves to access the escape command.

Shift - Bring up the map.  Press shift again to put the map away.

Hold V while moving – Strafe.   Doors/objects cannot be interacted with while strafing.

F3 - Switch to playing with a smaller screen or back.

F4 - Enter and exit full-screen mode.

F5 - Reload the game.
